00014 class QMLCHESSLIB_COMMON_DLLSPEC ChPiece
00015 {
00016 public:
00017     virtual ~ChPiece();
00018     virtual ChPieceColor color() const = 0;
00019     virtual QString type() const = 0;

00021 };

00029     explicit ChPieceBase(ChPieceColor color);

00031 
00032 protected:
00033     void diagonals(const ChSquare &square, const ChBoardData *data, ChSquares &result) const;

00038 
00039 private:
00040     ChPieceColor _color;
00041 };
